the_one_truth: Everything must align with the one truth in today's lie.

current_lie: Inequality - luxury vs necessity, access barriers
becomes_truth: Regenerative manufacturing - built to last, repairable
Equity - accessible transport for all, shared ownership
transformations.transformation_path: Transform from planned obsolescence to regenerative design. From exploitation to stewardship. From competition to cooperation. From control to transparency. From inequality to equity.
transformations.stewardship_model: Circular economy. Repairable design. Sustainable materials. Community ownership. Shared innovation.
transformations.community_benefit: Transport accessible to all. Clean air. Regenerative systems. Community ownership. Shared mobility.
transformations.environmental_impact: Current: High pollution, resource depletion. Future: Clean, regenerative, circular.
transformations.social_impact: Current: Access barriers, inequality. Future: Accessible, equitable, community-centered.
transformations.economic_impact: Current: Profit-driven, planned obsolescence. Future: Stewardship-driven, regenerative value.
transformations.current_state: Planned obsolescence. Resource exploitation. Pollution. Competition. Control. Inequality.
transformations.transition_state: Transitioning to regenerative design. Sustainable materials. Clean energy. Cooperation. Transparency. Equity.
transformations.future_state: Regenerative manufacturing. Stewardship. Clean energy. Cooperation. Transparency. Equity. Community ownership.

Accessibility - free or low-cost, open access
